code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [Education_ContentCDN] --> Idle
    Idle --> Connecting: connect(Education_StudentDB)
    Connecting --> Connected: connection_ok(Education_ContentCDN)
    Connecting --> Error: connection_error(Education_StudentDB)
    Connected --> Authenticated: authenticate(Education_StudentDB)
    Connected --> Error: auth_timeout(Education_ContentCDN)
    Authenticated --> Ready: init_complete(Education_ClassroomService)
    Authenticated --> Error: init_error(Education_ClassroomService)
    Ready --> Idle: disconnect(Education_StudentDB)
    Error --> Idle: reset(Education_GradeSync)
    Ready --> Transmitting: send_data(Education_LMS_Portal)
    Transmitting --> Ready: transmission_complete(Education_ClassroomService)
    Transmitting --> Error: transmission_error(Education_LMS_Portal)
